name: Hidden Objects New York City Winter Object Time
name_original: Hidden Objects New York City Winter Object Time
description:
Explore New York City in Winter touring Manhattan, icy Hudson River, Brooklyn Bridge, Wall Street, Central Park, Times Square, Upper Eastside, 5th Avenue & more finding Hidden Objects!

Hidden Objects – New York City Winter is an artistically crafted Seek & Find game with 30+ levels! 100’s of Objects to Find!

Discover the excitement of this World Famous City without leaving your home. Find New York City themed objects like yellow cabs, snow covered cars, NYC sports memorabilia, Statue of Liberty, pizza and more.

Levels vary from easy to difficult. A fun, object quest challenge for Hidden Object, Puzzle, Seek & Find, Spot the Difference, Brain & Word fans!

This Brain Challenging Adventure is sure to entertain your Empire State of mind!

Hidden Objects – New York Winter features:
Gorgeous, Crisp Graphics of the BIG Apple
3 Game Modes- Traditional, Chill, Adventure
Exciting Levels/Scenes of Hidden Object Puzzles
Artistically Crafted Levels
Zoom to Find Objects
Find Objects by Picture, Word, or Collector
Challenge Scenes with Missing Letters, Scrambled Words and Bonus Objects
Timed Challenges and Hints

Game Modes instructions:
TRADITIONAL-
Time limits
Hint limits
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

CHILL-
Time unlimited
Hints unlimited
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

ADVENTURE-
Time limits
Hint limits
Bonus Bonanza (words highlighted in green)
Missing Letters, Scrambled Words, Word Finder
15 Unique Levels
